paper.title: Fifo nets: a new model of parallel computation

author.org: Thomson-CSF Laboratoire Central de Recherches Domaine de Corbeville
Thomson-CSF Laboratoire Central de Recherches Domaine de Corbeville

paper.abstract: We introduce a new model of parallel computation, namely the FIFO nets. First, we introduce some basic definitions. A restriction of this model has the power of the Turing machine. Monogeneous Fifo nets are then introduced. The coverability tree is a procedure to decide whether a monogeneous net is bounded or not. At last, regularity is decidable for monogeneous nets.
